reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: VIETNAM - Wastewater collection and treatmen system of Tay Ninh town - Expert fund

description.narrative: Il progetto risponde alla richiesta dei residenti di Tay Ninh di migliorare le proprie condizioni di vita, riducendo il rischio di inondazioni ed eliminando l'inquinamento derivante dall'immissione di acque reflue non trattate in corsi d'acqua pulita

The project meets urgent demand of local residents to improve their living conditions by reducing floods and also by eliminating pollution caused by directly discharging untreated wastewater in Tay Ninh town.

participating-org.narrative: AICS - AGENZIA ITALIANA PER LA COOPERAZIONE ALLO SVILUPPO EPE
AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: By 2030, expand international cooperation and capacity-building support to developing countries in water- and sanitation-related activities and programmes, including water harvesting, desalination, water efficiency, wastewater treatment, recycling and reuse technologies

By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally
Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
